actions.recommendation: An annual cardiology review is recommended.

From age 45 prostate screening is recommended. Look out for any changes to your urinary patterns such as straining harder to urinate, dripping urine after urinating or having to wake up more often to pass urine.
Continue living an active lifestyle. Be sure to incorporate different exercise types to your current routine.
Keep your diet high in fresh veggies, fruit & protein. Limit foods high in saturated fats & supplements like Rychol to help lower cholesterol.
Prioritise practices that allow you to destress & refuel.
